column1: Kata Robata////The sushi I had was really great
column2: maybe even exceptional. It was pricey for small portion sizes
column3: but that's typical for any sushi restaurant. The reason I am downgrading my rating of this restaurant is because of its poor service. We waited nearly 15 minutes before a waiter asked us our order
column4: and another 35 minutes for one rice dish to arrive. Getting the check and receiving the receipt took very long too
column5: and we were even brought the wrong check by a different waitress than had been serving us. Management at Kata Robata should really consider investing in more staff
column6: so its patrons can really enjoy the food here.
